front.title: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3): Schema for the Remote Access Dialin User Service (RADIUS)

abstract.t: This document defines a schema for the Remote Access Dialin User Service (RADIUS). This schema makes it possible to integrate a RADIUS server with an LDAP-based directory service, making it possible for an organization to maintain a single store of user information. This consolidation is desirable since it results in a reduction in the administrative workload, and eliminates the need to synchronize across multiple user information stores.
